definitions.definition: ( Cockney rhyming slang ) A skin ( rolling paper for cigarettes ) .

main_definition: ( Cockney rhyming slang ) A skin ( rolling paper for cigarettes ) .

definitions.definition: A second-order measure of derivative price sensitivity, expressed as the rate of change of vega with respect to changes in the risk-free interest rate , or equivalently the rate of change of rho with respect to changes in the volatility of the underlying asset .

main_definition: ( finance ) A second-order measure of derivative price sensitivity, expressed as the rate of change of vega with respect to changes in the risk-free interest rate , or equivalently the rate of change of rho with respect to changes in the volatility of the underlying asset .
